description:
Krillin returns from his meeting with the Eldest Namekian only to be greeted by a pair of unwelcome visitors: Vegeta and Zarbon! Meanwhile, Gohan discovers the seventh and final Dragon Ball!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Genki ga Modottazo!! 100 Bai Chou Juuryoku no Naka no Gokuu
Goku treina numa gravidade 100 vezes maior!
แข็งแรงอีกครั้งโกคู!! โกคูฝึกในแรงโน้มถ่วง 100 เท่า
元気が戻ったぞ!! 100倍超重力の中の悟空
